quotes.quote: The whole point in bein' a hero is to do somethin' greater than yerself. It'd be easy to do it for the glory or the girls. We're bigger men than that.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Nurture your mind with great thoughts; to believe in the heroic makes heroes.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: There are new words now that excuse everybody. Give me the good old days of heroes and villains. the people you can bravo or hiss. There was a truth to them that all the slick credulity of today cannot touch.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: I think of a hero as someone who understands the degree of responsibility that comes with his freedom.
quotes.author: John Barth

quotes.quote: Everyone is necessarily the hero of his own life story.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A hero is no braver than an ordinary man, but he is braver five minutes longer.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Every hero becomes a bore at last.
quotes.author: Randy K. Milholland

quotes.quote: Our heroes are people and people are flawed. Don't let that taint the thing you love.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: The real hero is always a hero by mistake; he dreams of being an honest coward like everybody else.
quotes.author: Warren G. Harding

quotes.quote: America's present need is not heroics, but healing; not nostrums but normalcy; not revolution, but restoration.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Heroing is one of the shortest-lived professions there is.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: We can't all be heroes because somebody has to sit on the curb and clap as they go by.
